text: Phir jab woh bacchi uske haan paida hui to usne kaha “Maalik! Mere haan to ladki paida ho gayi hai, halaanke jo kuch usne janaa(delivered) tha, Allah ko iski khabar thi aur ladka ladki ki tarah nahin hota. Khair, maine uska naam Maryam rakh diya hai aur main usey aur uski aainda nasal ko shaytan mardood ke fitne se teri panaah mein deti hoon”
